description: Schema definition for connector-service helm subchart values

deployment.description: Configuration properties for the deployment component

args.description: Defining the arguments for the deployment component.

tokenLength.description: Specifies a number of characters in a registration token.

appTokenExpirationMinutes.description: Specifies a period of time after which a token for an Application expires. It is provided in minutes.

runtimeTokenExpirationMinutes.description: Specifies a period of time after which a token for a runtime expires. It is provided in minutes.

appValidityTime.description: Specifies a period of time during which certificates that the service issues for an Application are valid. It is provided in days.

runtimeValidityTime.description: Specifies a period of time during which certificates that the service issues for a runtime are valid. It is provided in days.

central.description: Determines whether the Connector Service works in the central mode.

envvars.description: Defining the environmental variables for the deployment component.

country.description: Specifies a country which is required generate a Certificate Signing Request. It is provided as a two-letter country code.

organization.description: Specifies an organization which is required to generate a Certificate Signing Request.

organizationalunit.description: Specifies an organizational unit which is required to generate a Certificate Signing Request.

locality.description: Specifies a locality which is required to generate a Certificate Signing Request.

province.description: Specifies a province which is required to generate a Certificate Signing Request.
